item.description:
Hi all, it is the annual Cambridge River festival this coming weekend. I am sure it would be a lot of fun. I will come by later as I am working that weekend but just wanted to share it with you all..
'32nd ANNUAL CAMBRIDGE RIVER FESTIVAL
Saturday, June 4, 2011, 12:00 Noon - 6:00 p.m.
Rain or Shine!
Join us for this one-day celebration of the arts, attracting 200,000 annually. This FREE event along the banks of the Charles River features jazz, folk, roots and world music performances, dance, art demonstrations, family art-making activities and over 100 specialty food purveyors and craftspeople!'
Details at - http://www2.cambridge...
item.name: 32nd ANNUAL CAMBRIDGE RIVER FESTIVAL - June 4, 12 noon to 6 pm
